Articles.Content:
Some thing something Kerbin War, something something kerbals love explosion, something something challenge. Muster up the craziest contraption you can, and battle out!

Rules:

1. You fight the last submission (defender) on this thread.

2. Your craft can have at most 100 parts, and each team consists of 4 crafts. Your craft must contain at least one weapons manager.

3. Your submission will start from the Island Runway, and the defender will start from KSC runway. For situations where both crafts cannot fly, both will start on the northern side of the runway, separated by 1.5km.

4. No flying into space, and no leaving the battlefield.(no flying out of physics range so that the enemy craft crashes.)

5. Winning is defined when all crafts of the other team cannot fire any of its weapons by using the AI only.

6. All actions, excluding initial startup, has to be done by BDAC AIs.

7. Mods allowed: BDAC.

8. Parts banned: USAF Airborne Laser.

9. You will be responsible for recording the entire battle and upload the video here as a proof (through youtube or other means). Winner will become the next defender. You shall run the battle in KSP v 1.8-1.8.3

10. Each battle will have 3 rounds. Winner of 2 rounds will be declared winner.

My submission: https://kerbalx.com/Xdthegreat/Surface-to-air-system

Battle!
